nodes.text: Shamdon Kree was a Human female pilot of the Smugglers' Alliance who lived during the Galactic Civil War.

After the Battle of Yavin, Shamdon Kree lived on Tatooine and served as pilot trainer in Lady Valarian's criminal organization. She was also a member of the Smuggler Alliance led by Talon Karrde. Circa 1 ABY, the Smuggler Alliance recruited a number of freelancer pilots and formed a starfighter squadron. Based in the Lucky Despot in Mos Eisley, Shamdon Kree dispatched the Smuggler Alliance pilots in a series of missions to defend the interests of Lady Valarian's organization. These missions included the destruction of Corsair starfighters in the Karthakk system, elimination of Black Sun aces in the Yavin system, escort of Valarian freighters against Hutt pirates in the Tatoo system, destruction of an Imperial patrol in the Dantooine system. Later, secondary missions also included escort of transports in the Karthakk system, hijacking of Imperial transports in the Dantooine system and destruction of Black Sun fighters in the Yavin system.
